properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:54AM CST until January 16 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers in Illinois...

Illinois River at Morris affecting Grundy County
Illinois River at Ottawa affecting La Salle County
Illinois River at La Salle affecting Bureau...La Salle and Putnam
Counties

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 24-48 hours into the future.

The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Illinois River at Ottawa, or from Heritage Harbor east of
Ottawa downstream to Starved Rock Lock and Dam.
* from Saturday evening to Thursday afternoon.
* At 1030 AM Friday the stage was 459.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 463.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Saturday evening and continue
to rise to near 467.0 feet by early Monday morning. The river will
fall below flood stage by Thursday morning.
* Impact...At 467.0 feet...Green Street near Shoreline Boat Club in
Ottawa is inundated, blocking a primary evacuation route for east
Ottawa.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...If you encounter a flooded roadway...turn around and
find an alternate route.

Additional information can be found at weather.gov/chicago.
